Plot: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.
Title: Insomnia
Writer: Hillary Seitz (screenplay), Nikolaj Frobenius, Erik Skjoldbjærg
Actors: Al Pacino, Martin Donovan, Oliver 'Ole' Zemen, Hilary Swank
tomatoConsensus: Driven by Pacino's performance, Insomnia is a smart and riveting psychological drama.
